Name: max_tasks_per_sprint
Description: Constrain total number of tasks planned per sprint backlog.

Name: max_features_per_release
Description: Limit number of features included in a single release to control scope.

Name: min_team_availability
Description: Require minimum availability for key roles before planning work.

Name: min_scrum_master_experience
Description: Require a minimum Scrum Master experience threshold for complex sprints.

Name: max_blocker_severity
Description: No sprint may proceed if any blocker exceeds severity threshold.

Name: max_total_feature_effort
Description: Cap cumulative estimated effort of features planned in the release.

Name: max_task_effort
Description: Disallow tasks that exceed an effort ceiling to keep work items small.

Name: min_story_points_mix
Description: Ensure minimum average story points to avoid underutilization.

Name: max_backlog_size
Description: Keep product backlog size within manageable bounds.

Name: max_review_duration
Description: Keep sprint review within timebox to protect team energy.

Name: max_daily_scrum_duration
Description: Daily Scrum must respect the 15-minute timebox.

Name: min_team_size
Description: Ensure minimum team size for cross-functional capacity.

Name: max_tasks_on_board
Description: Limit WIP by capping number of cards on the scrum board.
